articles.author: Aramide Tinubu
articles.title: Ncuti Gatwa Delights in Disney+’s Audacious and Adventurous ‘Doctor Who’: TV Review - Variety
articles.description: Ncuti Gatwa and Millie Gibson make for the perfect pairing in Disney+'s take on "Doctor Who."
articles.content: As the new Doctor at the helm of the Tardis, the police box-shaped time-traveling ship, Ncuti Gatwa takes “Doctor Who” on a thrilling ride that doesn’t disappoint. The ancient alien and his latest co… [+3444 chars]
